Line 20: Line 20:
However, there appears to be a degree of crossover in some countries between ultras and hooligans. In Italy, when English club [[Middlesbrough F.C.|Middlesbrough]] played a match against [[AS Roma]] in March 2006, three Middlesbrough fans were stabbed in an attack that was blamed on Roma supporting ultras.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/england/tees/4808246.stm|title=English fans are stabbed in Rome|publisher=[[BBC]]|date=2006-03-15|accessdate=2011-02-05}}</ref>
However, there appears to be a degree of crossover in some countries between ultras and hooligans. In Italy, when English club [[Middlesbrough F.C.|Middlesbrough]] played a match against [[AS Roma]] in March 2006, three Middlesbrough fans were stabbed in an attack that was blamed on Roma supporting ultras.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/england/tees/4808246.stm|title=English fans are stabbed in Rome|publisher=[[BBC]]|date=2006-03-15|accessdate=2011-02-05}}</ref>
